summary: Encapsulates the computation of the Recurrent Neural Network Transducer (RNNT) loss tailored for self‑supervised learning scenarios, exposing a unified interface for loss evaluation during model training.
business_intent: Provides a ready‑to‑use RNNT loss component that can be integrated into self‑supervised speech or sequence modeling pipelines, simplifying model optimization and accelerating development of high‑accuracy transcription systems.
